title: CLARETTE LINK NECKLACE, GOLD
description: The Clarette necklace is our most beloved necklace. The go-anywhere, do-anything revival collar is big enough to layer atop sweaters and sleek enough to wear bare chested. Add some weight to your fall shift in tone. She's the necklace that changes everything.

Size: 16 inches
